name: Fire Elemental
movement: 50 ft. movement allows fast approach to enemies
description: A living, ever-burning mass of flame, constantly flickering and shifting in form. Its body is composed entirely of fire and can move through spaces as narrow as one inch without squeezing.
memorable: Ignites everything it touches and can continuously damage foes nearby with its Fiery Aura.
goals: To wreak havoc and destruction, often summoned by powerful spellcasters.
relations: Commonly summoned by powerful sorcerers or mages.
environment: Typically found in hot environments or as summoned creatures from the Elemental Plane of Fire.
strengths: Immune to fire and poison damage; possesses high mobility and area damage abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage; takes damage if submerged in water.
attacks: Multiattack with two slam attacks that deal fire damage and can ignite targets; also has powerful ranged fire attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Fiery Aura that damages nearby creatures and causes ongoing fire damage to those it ignites.
additional_information: Elemental Nature allows it to exist without air, food, or sleep.
Elements of stealth with Fire Camouflage in large flames.
Can shed bright light in a 30-foot radius.
Fast-moving entity with potential for surprise attacks.
Can navigate through enemy spaces without provoking attacks.
test_queries: destructive entity from Elemental Plane of Fire
